name: Green Piloting - Weekly Gam Jam 161
description:
Fly your plane to defeat enemies and shoot for a high score. Based roughly off of classic arcade game 'Slapfight'

Made for weekly game jam 161. Not very good, as I ran out of the time I had available for the jam. The sound especially isn't well balanced, I would suggest turning your volume down before you play.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Z/Left Click to shoot

X/Right Click to upgrade

Credits:

Font used: https://managore.itch.io/m3x6
